quote1: A happy man is too satisfied with the present to dwell too much on the future.
quote2: Unthinking respect for authority is the greatest enemy of truth.
quote3: Nature shows us only the tail of the lion. But there is no doubt in my mind that the lion belongs with it even if he cannot reveal himself to the eye all at once because of his huge dimension. We see him only the way a louse sitting upon him would.
